definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: This method was successfully applied to the determination of gallic acid in Jianming Yanhou tablets.
sentences.chinese: 方法成功地用於健民咽喉片中沒食子酸的測定。

sentences.english: HPLC method for the determination of stachydrine hydrochloride in Yimucao tablets was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了HPLC法測定益母草片中鹽酸水蘇鹼的含量。

sentences.english: Lin Jiadong acts a strange pet shop customer in the piece.
sentences.chinese: 林家棟則在片中扮演一個奇怪的寵物店顧客。

sentences.english: Song Hye - kyo is learning traditional Kongfu for her part in the Hwangjini.
sentences.chinese: 爲了片中的角色，宋慧喬正在學習傳統的中國功夫。

sentences.english: The Qidong dialect is a dialect spot in the Lou Shao dialect district of Hunan language family.
sentences.chinese: 祁東方言是湘語系婁邵片中的一個方言點。

sentences.english: To establish a HPLC method for the determination of emodin in Jingtianquban tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立景天祛斑片中大黃素的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the female characters of this film are all more initiative and opinionative .
sentences.chinese: 事實上，片中女角都比男角主動和有主見。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of asiaticoside in Jixuedai tablet by thin lay chromatography scanning(TLC-scanning).
sentences.chinese: 目的採用薄層掃描法測定積雪甙片中積雪草苷的含量。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a HPLC method for determination of hesperidin in Weixuekang tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立維血康片中橙皮苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Chen Daoming received the Best Performance award for his role in the film.
sentences.chinese: 陳道明憑藉在此片中的演出獲最佳男演員獎。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a simple sensitive HPLC method for determining hesperidin in Fuke baibai tables.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立婦科白帶片中橙皮苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Fig. 3.33. What is the unusual dilatation ( arrow ) above the right main-stem bronchus?
sentences.chinese: 這張片中右主支氣管上的異常凸起物是什麼？

sentences.english: Object To establish the method determining content of tetrahydropalmatine in Fukang tablets.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立婦康片中延胡索乙素的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Q33: So are the guys in the movie retired?
sentences.chinese: 片中的軍人，是退役的嗎？

sentences.english: To establish coefficient multiplying ratio spectrophotometry for determination of pyramidon andcaffeinein naoning tablet .
sentences.chinese: 建立腦寧片中氨基比林和咖啡因的係數倍率測定法。

sentences.english: A quality control method was established for identification and determination of artificial Cow-Bezoar in Houjiling Tablets.
sentences.chinese: 建立喉疾靈片中人工牛黃的質量控制方法。

definition: scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
end credits (of a movie etc)/ending (of a movie etc)
